name: Kekkon: Marriage
overview: Kekkon is a Japanese adventure game in dating simulation style. You meet up to five girls, or guys if you start the game as a female, and go on several dating activities, following a schedule. As time passes your relationship with them might evolve, from girlfriend/boyfriend to fiancé, and finally spouse. The game's title is tautological, since "kekkon" is the Japanese word for marriage.
